sections.heading: to cross highways and railroads
sections.text: The district may dig ditches and drains under and across railroads and public highways.SourceLaws 1907, c. 153, § 24, p. 484;R.S.1913, § 1894;C.S.1922, § 1842;C.S.1929, § 31-530;R.S.1943, § 31-430.AnnotationsSection is constitutional and the county can impose no condi

sections.heading: constitutional and the county can impose no conditions. Douglas County v. Papillion Drainage District, 92 Neb. 771, 139 N.W. 718 (1913).
sections.text: constitutional and the county can impose no conditions. Douglas County v. Papillion Drainage District, 92 Neb. 771, 139 N.W. 718 (1913).
